department.dept_long_name: Department of Germanic Languages and Literatures

course.title: Gegenwartsliteratur: Korper-Poetiken seit der Wende
course.description: Explores German literature from the Wendezeit to the present, focusing on a number of texts that we will define as `body literature' or `corpoetics'. Rather than directly addressing the fall of the Wall, these texts employ a transgressive poetics that tears down the walls between text and body in the search for authentic communication.
course.notes: Readings in German, discussions in German and English.
